vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συμπαραγίγνομαι,
to be ready at the same time, of crops ripening, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 arrive or be present at the same time, [Refs 3rd c.BC+]; come together, [NT]
__3 come together with, of planets, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II stand by another, τινι [NT+4th c.BC+]; come in to assist, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(middle) to come together assemble
to be present together with; to come together, convene, Lk. 23:48*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 前來聚集 #路 23:48|
2) 前來幫助某人的需要 #提後 4;16|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 前来聚集 #路 23:48|
2) 前来帮助某人的需要 #提后 4;16|
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: tụ tập; tập hợp lại với nhau. σύν (G4862) + παραγίνομαι (G3854)
